Metadata.title: Omar Elbaz | SaaS Architect & Full Stack Engineer
Metadata.description: Senior Full Stack Engineer building digital empires with Next.js, React, and scalable cloud architectures. Available for innovation.

Hero.title: Architecting Digital Empires
Hero.description: I craft immersive 3D experiences and scalable web applications that redefine user interaction.

About.title: Beyond the Code
About.description: I don't just write code; I design systems. With a background in architectural engineering and computer science, I blend structural precision with creative fluidity. My approach is rooted in building scalable, maintainable, and performant applications that stand the test of time.

Projects.title: Selected Works
Projects.desc_1: An enterprise-grade AI platform leveraging GPT models for automated content generation, campaign optimization, and real-time analytics dashboards.
Projects.desc_2: A comprehensive financial dashboard featuring real-time market data visualization, portfolio tracking, and advanced charting powered by D3.js.
Projects.desc_3: A headless e-commerce solution built on Shopify's Storefront API with custom checkout flows, inventory management, and blazing-fast performance.

Footer.built_with: Built with Next.js, Tailwind & Love in Morocco.
